newsitem.title: ITALY: Milan to announce prelim Oct CPI data on Oct 21.
newsitem.headline: Milan to announce prelim Oct CPI data on Oct 21.

text.p: Milan, one of the 10 sample Italian cities which publish preliminary consumer price inflation data, will announce its figures for October on October 21, the city's press office said.
The official calendar for the publication of the cities' CPI data is likely to be issued later this week.
Italian September year-on-year inflation was 3.4 percent, unchanged on August.
Milan's CPI has a weighting of 19.1 percent on the national index while the 10 cities have a combined weighting of 69.67 percent on the total index.
National statistics institute ISTAT will announce final national CPI data for October on November 6.
